battlecode.common
Interface ComponentController

All Known Subinterfaces:
BroadcastController, BugController, BuilderController, DropshipController, IronController, JumpController, MovementController, SensorController, SpecialController, WeaponController
public interface ComponentController

An interface for controlling a component of a robot.

Method Summary
 ComponentClass componentClass()
          Equivalent to type().componentClass.
 RobotController getRC()
          Returns the RobotController for this component's robot.
 boolean isActive()
          Returns true if this component is currently being used.
 int roundsUntilIdle()
          Returns the number of rounds until this component becomes idle.
 ComponentType type()
          Returns the type of this component.
 boolean withinRange(MapLocation loc)
          Returns true if loc is within this component's range.
